chess.algorithms
Class RandomGen

java.lang.Object
  chess.algorithms.MoveAlgorithm
      chess.algorithms.RandomGen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
public class RandomGen
extends MoveAlgorithm
implements java.io.Serializable

RandomGen, a subclass of MoveAlgorithm, generates a random move. It chooses a random move from a valid list of moves.

Author:
Arvydas Bancewicz
See Also:
Serialized Form
